vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 31655, previously approved on September 23, 2020, as amended by Ordinance No. 31884, previously approved on June 9, 2021, authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2020-21 for various departments, activities, and projects; and authorize the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Financing: General Fund ($1,481,897,935), Enterprise, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,363,639,214), Capital Funds ($1,454,481,707), and Grants, Trusts and Other Funds ($103,865,643)
vote.description: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 31655, previously approved on September 23, 2020, as amended by Ordinance No. 31884, previously approved on June 9, 2021, authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2020-21 for various departments, activities, and projects; and authorize the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Financing: General Fund ($1,481,897,935), Enterprise, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,363,639,214), Capital Funds ($1,454,481,707), and Grants, Trusts and Other Funds ($103,865,643)
